meanings.definition: Consisting of or containing quinic acid.
meanings.sent1: The quinate solution had a bitter taste.
meanings.sent2: The quinate compound was found in the plant extract.
meanings.sent3: The quinate mixture turned out to be surprisingly colorful.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as quinate as the morning dew.
meanings.sent5: The quinate aroma filled the room with a refreshing scent.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of quinic acid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a quinate to help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: The quinate was used as a natural food additive.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a pinch of quinate to the recipe for flavor.
meanings.sent4: His collection of rare quinates was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The quinate in the drink gave it a unique tangy taste.
